name: Lime Green Skunk
description: Happy and relaxed, Lime Green Skunk is the laid-back daughter of Super Skunk and Northern Lights. The “Lime Green” description holds true for both its coloring and aroma. This strain features vibrant lime-colored leaves with a hefty amount of burnt orange hairs. The taste is a strong, sweet citrus, and the smell is equally as tropical. Great for daytime smoking, LGS produces sativa-like energizing effects while still providing a calm and floaty buzz.
descriptionPlain: Happy and relaxed, Lime Green Skunk is the laid-back daughter of Super Skunk and Northern Lights. The “Lime Green” description holds true for both its coloring and aroma. This strain features vibrant lime-colored leaves with a hefty amount of burnt orange hairs. The taste is a strong, sweet citrus, and the smell is equally as tropical. Great for daytime smoking, LGS produces sativa-like energizing effects while still providing a calm and floaty buzz.

highlightedReviews.text: Lime Green Skunk ain't no punk; comes in with an energetic rush, then mellows you out with a relaxed feeling. I've said it before, I like to be active when I medicate and this strain is like a pre-workout drink. it's perfect for a nice 30 minute HIIT routine, then a decompressing stretch session.

First time trying Lime Green Skunk and I just have to say this stuff is bomb as hell, taste exactly like Like Lime Green Skunk, the smell is unbelievable! This is a Sativa dominant strain but my god itâ€™s so good.....ğŸ¤©

articles.title: Luck o' the Irish: 15 'Green' Strains to Help You Celebrate St. Patrick's Day
articles.author: Rebecca Kelley
articles.text:
Even if you havenâ€™t got a little Irish in ya, most everyone enjoys celebrating St. Patrickâ€™s Day. After all, itâ€™s an excuse to drink some Guinness, eat some soda bread and corned beef with hash, and pinch forgetful friends who arenâ€™t wearing some hue of green today. This being Leafly, of course, we have a list ofÂ strains with a little â€œgreenâ€ in them to help you further celebrate a fun little holiday.
Without further ado, here are 15Â green-themed cannabis strains:
Â  1.Â Green Candy
Type:Â sativa
Top flavors:Â sweet,Â citrus,Â minty
Top effects:Â happy,Â euphoric,Â energetic
Top medical uses:Â pain,Â stress,Â depression
Sample review:
â€œOne of the top 5 sativas. I always want this as part of my available medications.â€ â€“ Crucian1
Â  2.Â Green Crack
Type:Â sativa
Top flavors:Â sweet
Top effects:Â euphoric,Â uplifted,Â energetic
Top medical uses:Â stress,Â depression,Â pain
Sample review:
â€œI love this strain. Gives me a light, pleasant high thatâ€™s perfect to unwind and listen to music to. Especially with friends! Definitely try this, people!â€Â â€“ EmAy55
Â  3.Â Green Crack Extreme
Type:Â sativa
Top flavors:Â sweet,Â citrus,Â minty
Top effects:Â euphoric,Â happy,Â uplifted
Top medical uses:Â stress,Â fatigue,Â depression
Sample review:
â€œIts [sic] a step above most sativa strains and probably some of the best Sativas available.â€ â€“ Crucian1
Â  4.Â Green Door Kush
Type:Â hybrid
Top flavors:Â lemon,Â sweet
Top effects:Â creative,Â euphoric,Â happy
Top medical uses:Â nausea,Â insomnia,Â muscle spasms
Sample review:
â€œLove the taste and smell. Some great stuff even for a long time smoker, but if you a new be, be carefulâ€ â€“ KevinlovesBud
Â  5.Â Green Dream
Type:Â hybrid
Top flavors:Â minty,Â pine,Â spicy/herbal
Top effects:Â euphoric,Â happy,Â uplifted
Top medical uses:Â stress,Â depression,Â pain
Sample review:
â€œI love this strain. I was cleaning and organizing my house like crazy. Very talkative and energetic. Amazing day high.â€ â€“ KSlizzle
Â  6.Â Green Goblin
Type:Â sativa
Top flavors:Â diesel,Â grapefruit,Â pine
Top effects:Â euphoric,Â uplifted,Â happy
Top medical uses:Â stress,Â pain,Â depression
Sample review:
â€œVery good strain. No heavy eyes. No laziness. Very uplifting feeling and sense if [sic] euphoria.â€ â€“ Anonymous
Â  7.Â Green Haze
Type:Â sativa
Top flavors:Â pine,Â tea,Â woody
Top effects:Â focused,Â uplifted,Â euphoric
Top medical uses:Â pain,Â nausea,Â stress
Sample review:
â€œGreat Strain for anxiety, make u feel really up and euphoric great for focusing and just taking on the dayâ€ â€“ Eric420
Â  8.Â Green Hornet
Type:Â hybrid
Top flavors:Â none tagged â€”Â leave a review!
Top effects:Â euphoric,Â focused,Â happy
Top medical uses:Â depression,Â pain,Â stress
Sample review:
â€œDELICIOUS!!! My tummy was hurting this morning but after a little green hornet in my bowl Iâ€™m feeling ready to take on the day!â€ â€“ AZCSWestPhx
Â  9.Â Green Kush
Type:Â indica
Top flavors:Â sweet,Â apricot,Â honey
Top effects:Â euphoric,Â relaxed,Â focused
Top medical uses:Â pain,Â depression,Â stress
Sample review:
â€œVery very potent strain, gets you a very heavy body high along with a bit of a head high. Prepare to turn into potato, but great for parties/groups. Very stoned.â€ â€“ Anonymous
Â  10.Â Green Monster
Type:Â hybrid
Top flavors:Â earthy,Â pine,Â pungent
Top effects:Â sleepy,Â relaxed,Â happy
Top medical uses:Â insomnia,Â stress,Â depression
Sample review:
â€œi either have some strong shit or its [sic] all this good haha at least as good as green crack, mabie [sic] betterâ€ â€“ Anonymous
Â  11.Â Green Queen
Type:Â hybrid
Top flavors:Â spicy/herbal,Â earthy,Â nutty
Top effects:Â happy,Â uplifted,Â euphoric
Top medical uses:Â stress,Â nausea,Â depression
Sample review:
â€œGreen queen is my go to when I need to be productive. This is the most productive strain Iâ€™ve used with the least amount of anxiety. Can also be very giggly.â€Â â€“ ChristWithAY
Â  12.Â Green Ribbon
Type:Â hybrid
Top flavors:Â citrus,Â pungent,Â skunk
Top effects:Â energetic,Â happy,Â uplifted
Top medical uses:Â stress,Â nausea,Â pain
Sample review:
â€œOne of only two strains Iâ€™ve ever smoked thatâ€™s given me energy. I find that my thoughts are very focused, and I can carry on conversations exceptionally well. Great strain for sitting around and talking. Very social strain. It actually made me want to dance!â€Â â€“ Anonymous
Â  13.Â Lime Green Skunk
Type:Â hybrid
Top flavors:Â none tagged â€”Â leave a review!
Top effects:Â uplifted,Â happy, euphoric
Top medical uses:Â stress,Â pain,Â insomnia
Sample review:
â€œHave enjoyed this strian very much. A very great energetic high, that really seems to mute grey down feelings both mentally and physically, and bring out higher, more talkitive [sic] sides. Very great for every aspect of enjoyment.â€Â â€“ Anonymous
Â  14.Â Martian Mean Green
Type:Â hybrid
Top flavors:Â sweet,Â blue cheese,Â grapefruit
Top effects:Â relaxed, euphoric,Â uplifted
Top medical uses:Â inflammation,Â nausea,Â stress
Sample review:
â€œIt creeps up on you, makes you laugh and relieves pain. All around good time for a few hours.â€Â â€“ gurren_lynx
Â  15. Super Green Crack
Type:Â sativa
Top flavors:Â spicy/herbal,Â woody,Â diesel
Top effects:Â energetic,Â creative,Â happy
Top medical uses:Â stress,Â pain,Â fatigue
Sample review:
â€œBOMB Very mental.â€Â â€“ PuffPuffington911

Great for daytime smoking, LGS produces sativa-like energizing effects while still providing a calm and floaty buzz.
